Hey guys, how can I watch 3D movies on (or via my) laptop.. on my 3D LED TV?

Any reply is greatly appreciated =)

+1

thanks a ton ,
thanks YIFY......

seedandtorrent: to watch on your computer I would use VLC music player if you search it in google its really obvious, easy to install & use. as for playing it on your tv, you would need either an hdmi or vga cable, depending on how new your devices are. if both are within a year or two old, probably hdmi (looks like a bigger usb port) and when the two connect, change the input on the tv to hdmi (or vga if you have to use that) and it'll connect automatically. hope it works.

Quality is appropriate for the size. If you don't want the stupid 5 or 7 gig release thats true 720 but want a clean picture just wait till yify comes out with 1080.
